name: Markaround
body: Currently in development, Markaround is a Markdown Flavor written in OCaml. Markaround is designed to simplify html document and static website development and compiles directly to html. It focuses on simplicity and ease of production, yet still allows css and js tie-ins as well as direct html embedding for advanced and tailored applications.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
